TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs

summary.span: 为 focus-changed 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for a focus-changed event.

related.span: 订阅 UI 自动化事件
客户端的 UI 自动化事件

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 idObject, int32 idChild) cil managed
Public Sub New (idObject As Integer, idChild As Integer)

param.name: idObject
param.span: 已接收到焦点的对象的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]。

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.

param.name: idChild
param.span: 已获得焦点的对象的子 ID。

span.span: The child ID of the object that received focus.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `idObject`和 `idChild` 参数包含 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] 对象标识符，UI 自动化客户端可以使用这些对象标识符将连接 到 `IAccessible` 较旧的辅助性技术应用程序中的对象。The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object identifiers that UI Automation clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChildId As Integer
public: property int ChildId { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取接收焦点的对象的子 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] 标识符。

span.span: Gets the child [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] identifier of the object receiving focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] 为32位值，用于标识应用程序中可访问对象的类别。Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. `idObject`和 `idChild` 参数包含对象 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] ，客户端可以使用该对象将对象链接 到 `IAccessible` 较旧的辅助性技术应用程序中的对象。The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ObjectId As Integer
public: property int ObjectId { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取生成事件的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] 对象的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object that generated the event.

value.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]正在接收焦点的元素的 ID。

span.span: The ID of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element that is receiving focus.

value.span: 有关可能的值，请参阅 对象标识符。

span.span: For possible values, see Object Identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] 为32位值，用于标识应用程序中可访问对象的类别。Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. `idObject`和 `idChild` 参数包含对象 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] ，客户端可以使用该对象将对象链接 到 `IAccessible` 较旧的辅助性技术应用程序中的对象。The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
